00043 /**************************************************************************
00044 * DEFINITIONS
00045 **************************************************************************/
00046 #define MSG_PRIO_SYSTEM  0                    
00047 #define MSG_PRIO_ALARM   (1<<1)               
00048 #define MSG_PRIO_HIGH    (1<<0)               
00049 #define MSG_PRIO_LOW     (1<<1 | 1<<0)        
00050 #define MSG_MASK         0xC                  
00052 #define T_BROADCAST_DATA       0x8000         
00053 #define T_BROADCAST_DATA_MASK  0x80FC         
00054 #define T_CONNECT_REQ          0x0080         
00055 #define T_CONNECT_REQ_MASK     0x80FF         
00056 #define T_DISCONNECT_REQ       0x0081         
00057 #define T_DISCONNECT_REQ_MASK  0x80FF         
00059 #define PROGRAMMING_MODE       0x81           
00060 #define MONITOR_MODE           0x90           
00061 #define LINK_MODE              0x12           
00062 #define TRANSPORT_MODE         0x96           
00063 #define APPLICATION_MODE       0x1E           
00064 #define RESET_MODE             0xC0           
00067 #define BASE_ADDRESS_OFFSET           0x0100  
00069 #define MANUFACTORER_ADR_LOW          0x0104  ///< Low address for manufactorer id
00070 #define MANUFACTORER_ADR              0x0104  
00071 #define DEVICE_NUMBER_HIGH            0x0105  
00072 #define DEVICE_NUMBER_LOW             0x0106  
00073 #define SOFTWARE_VERSION_NUMBER       0x0107  
00074 #define APPLICATION_PROGRAMM          0x010C  
00076 #define PORT_A_DIRECTION_BIT          0x010C  ///< Port A Direction Bit Setting
00077 #define APPLICATION_RUN_STATUS        0x010D  
00078 #define ROUTECOUNT                    0x010E  
00079 #define ASSOCTABPTR                   0x0111  
00080 #define COMMSTAB_ADDRESS              0x0112  
00081 #define COUNT_GRP_ADDRESSES           0x0116  
00082 #define PA_ADDRESS_HIGH               0x0117  
00083 #define PA_ADDRESS_LOW                0x0118  
00084 #define START_ADDRESS_GROUP_ADR       0x0119  
00086 #define START_ADDRESS_GROUP_ADDRESSES 0x0119  ///< address in eeprom where group addresses are stored  */
